Layout.name: Layout
Layout.description:
Pass width and height parameters;
Or just already existing ImageData as a source.

Layer.name: Layer
Layer.description:
The Layer object here is just a wrapper for ImageDataArray;
So for most of the methods the reference on layout is required.

params.name: source
params.description: Specify other buffer or a size (without offset)

example:
var layer = new pxl.Layout.Layer(8 * 16, layout, "Background");
		//if suppose that layout is 8x16

classitems.description: User defined type.
classitems.name: controller

classitems.description: Helpful in case when method can take an object without options.
classitems.name: emptyOptions

classitems.description: Type of an array that uses by ImageData. Depends on browser.
classitems.name: ImageDataArray

classitems.description: Is API supported on current browser.
classitems.name: isSupported

classitems.description: More safest and fastest method to create ImageData.
classitems.name: createImageData

classitems.description: Clamp a number to min/max borders.
classitems.name: clamp

classitems.description: More safest and fastest method to create canvas elements.
classitems.name: createCanvas

classitems.description: Warn: make sure that parameters are fit to range 0..255!
classitems.name: toRGBA

classitems.description: Floating point error for comparison method.
Return string is JSON format.
classitems.name: toString

classitems.description:
Add two Point instances;
or add Point instance with numbers.
classitems.name: add

classitems.description:
Substract one Point instance from another;
or substrast number from Point instance.
classitems.name: sub

classitems.description:
Multiply two Point instances;
or multiply Point instance by numbers.
classitems.name: mul

classitems.description:
Divide one Point instance by another;
or divide Point instance by numbers.
classitems.name: div

classitems.description:
Copy Point instance;
or set new values for Point instance.
classitems.name: set

classitems.description:
Compare two Point instances
or compare Point instance properties with numbers.
classitems.name: cmp

classitems.description: Make Point instance properties absolute.
classitems.name: abs

classitems.description: Make Point instance properties negative.
classitems.name: neg

classitems.description: Swap properties between Point instances.
classitems.name: swap

classitems.description: Round down Point instance properties.
classitems.name: floor

classitems.description: Round up Point instance properties.
classitems.name: ceil

classitems.description: Round Point instance properties.
classitems.name: round

classitems.description: Check properties for NaN.
classitems.name: hasNaN

classitems.description: Check properties for Infinity.
classitems.name: hasInfinity

classitems.description: Make new Point instance with same properties.
classitems.name: clone

params.name: method
params.description: [out] The method to execute when event is fired.

params.name: method
params.description: [in] Have to be same reference that passed in subscribe method.

classitems.description: Ellipse inside rectangle.
classitems.name: ellipse
create

props.name: element
props.description: The canvas for drawing, or any other element as a parent.

props.name: source
props.description: New instance will listen all changes on source.

classitems.description: List of all existing View instances.
classitems.name: instances

classitems.description: Reference onto the currently active view instance.
classitems.name: activeView

classitems.description: Clear canvas and update imageData and draw.
classitems.name: render

classitems.description: Draw rectangle at canvas element directly.
classitems.name: drawRect

classitems.description: Just redraw from old/previous imageData condition.
classitems.name: redraw

classitems.description: Clear canvas element directly.
classitems.name: clear

classitems.description: Update the buffer from layout (model).
classitems.name: update

classitems.description: Transform canvas according to scale & translate.
classitems.name: begin

classitems.description: Restore context.
classitems.name: end
setScale

classitems.description: Transform position according to the current scale offset.
classitems.name: fitToTransition

classitems.description: Note: changes style too.
classitems.name: resizeElement

classitems.description: Listen for events that fired when layout (model) has been changed.
classitems.name: _subscribe

classitems.description: Stop listen the layout (model) changes.
classitems.name: _unsubscribe

classitems.description: Destructor.
classitems.name: destroy

classitems.description: Model event name.
classitems.name: PIXELS_CHANGED_EVENT

classitems.description:
Append new Layer instance into the layerList;
activeLayer point on new instance.
classitems.name: insertLayer

params.name: index
params.description: [in] Index where to insert. Or it would be added to top if no index passed.

classitems.description: Change an active layer.
classitems.name: setActiveTo

classitems.description: Delete an active layer.
classitems.name: deleteLayer
mergeLayers

classitems.description:
Replace old colour by new one;
Delegate processing to the activeLayer.
classitems.name: colorReplace

classitems.description:
Set pixel or group of pixels (force-fill);
Delegate processing to the activeLayer.
classitems.name: set

classitems.description:
Setting the value for specific channel;
Delegate processing to the activeLayer.
classitems.name: setChannel

classitems.description:
Flood fill;
Delegate processing to the activeLayer.
classitems.name: fill

classitems.description: Provide an index from position.
classitems.name: indexAt
example:
var index = layout.indexAt(new pxl.Point(1, 1));
		//in 8x16 layout, an index would be equal to 9

classitems.description: Provide position according to index (without offset).
classitems.name: positionFrom
example:
var position = layout.positionFrom(9);
		//in 8x16 layout, the position would be equal to {x: 1, y: 1}

classitems.description: Get whole image data or just a part of it (according to options).
classitems.name: getImageData
fixRange

return.description: False if range can't be fixed.

classitems.description: Warn: for internal usage only!
classitems.name: __process

classitems.description: Destructor.
classitems.name: destroy

classitems.description: Strict limitation, but that's enough for pixel-art.
classitems.name: MAX_BUFFER_SIZE

classitems.description: Reset the data to default (completelly fill with zeroes).
classitems.name: reset

classitems.description: Warn: layers have to be from same layout or at least have equal size.
classitems.name: copyFrom

classitems.description:
Merge each pixel of two layers;
Or apply merging to pixels within start and offset area.
classitems.name: merge

classitems.description:
Replace specific color by the new one on whole layer;
Or just on area within start and offset options.
classitems.name: colorReplace

classitems.description:
Set new color for layer;
Or just for area within start and offset options.
classitems.name: set

classitems.description:
Change specific channel for layer;
Or channel for area within start and offset options.
classitems.name: setChannel

classitems.description:
Flood fill (no recursion, custom stack);
Can be applyed for area within start and offset options.
classitems.name: fill

classitems.description: Look at: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alpha_compositing#Alpha_blending
classitems.name: mixAt

classitems.description: Warn: index without color-offset!
classitems.name: pixelFromIndex

classitems.description: Index with color-offset (which equal to x4 (rgba)).
classitems.name: pixelAt

classitems.description:
Destructor.
Tip: don't forget to clean the history cache.
classitems.name: destroy

classitems.description:
Special recording flag. Cache method have to be used once on session.
Use case: methods like fill or replaceColor.
classitems.name: STATIC_SHOT

classitems.description:
Special recording flag. Cache method may be used as many times as possible.
Use case: user draw lines.
classitems.name: DYNAMIC_SHOT

classitems.description: Point on the current active index in container
classitems.name: _pointer

classitems.description: Start Layer recording.
classitems.name: record

params.name: forgetFirst
params.description: [in] When new session is saved, the first one is removed.

classitems.name: stop

classitems.description: Clear the current session.
classitems.name: resetRecording

classitems.description: Remove sessions with deleted/empty layers.
classitems.name: clean

classitems.description: Reference on the layer.
classitems.name: layer

classitems.description: Reference on the layer.
classitems.name: layer

classitems.description: Will cache an index and the color from one.
classitems.name: cache

params.name: param
params.description: [in] Pass the usual options or an index of the pixel.

classitems.description: Swap data from session to current layer's data.
classitems.name: rewrite

classitems.description: Will cache the whole token array.
classitems.name: cache

throws.description: "Static sessions can be cached only once!"

classitems.description: Swap data from session to current layer's data.
classitems.name: rewrite
